original: intros g f lg lf x H1 H2 H3 H4. apply is_lim_div. - apply is_lim_ext_loc with (f := fun y => f y) (x := x) (l := lf). intros y. unfold Rdiv. reflexivity. apply H1. - apply is_lim_ext_loc with (f := fun y => g y) (x := x) (l := lg). intros y. unfold Rdiv. reflexivity. apply H2. - apply Rbar_div_no_0. apply H3. - apply ex_Rbar_div_sym. apply H4.
